metadata.title: CVE-2024-25939 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Mirrored regions with different values in 3rd Generation Intel(R) Xeon(R)Scalable Processors may allow a privileged user to potentially enabledenial of service via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240813.0ubuntu0.20.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20240813.0ubuntu0.20.04.2').
